verses.verse: Also I in the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the Mede, <S%H4075><s%> even I, stood <S%H5975><s%> to confirm <S%H2388><s%> and to strengthen <S%H4581><s%> him.

And now <S%H6258><s%> will I show <S%H5046><s%> you the truth. <S%H571><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there shall stand <S%H5975><s%> up yet <S%H5750><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> in Persia; <S%H6539><s%> and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> shall be far <S%H1419><s%> richer <S%H6238><s%> than they all: <S%H3605><s%> and by his strength <S%H2394><s%> through his riches <S%H6239><s%> he shall stir <S%H5782><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> against the realm <S%H4438><s%> of Grecia. <S%H3120><s%>

And a mighty <S%H1368><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> up, that shall rule <S%H4910><s%> with great <S%H7227><s%> dominion, <S%H4474><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> according to his will. <S%H7522><s%>

And when he shall stand <S%H5975><s%> up, his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> shall be broken, <S%H7665><s%> and shall be divided <S%H2673><s%> toward the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and not to his posterity, <S%H319><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> according to his dominion <S%H4915><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he ruled: <S%H4910><s%> for his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> shall be plucked <S%H5428><s%> up, even for others <S%H312><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> those. <S%H428><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall be strong, <S%H2388><s%> and one of his princes; <S%H8269><s%> and he shall be strong <S%H2388><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> him, and have dominion; <S%H4910><s%> his dominion <S%H4474><s%> shall be a great <S%H7227><s%> dominion. <S%H4475><s%>

And in the end <S%H7093><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> they shall join <S%H2266><s%> themselves together; for the king's <S%H4428><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> an agreement: <S%H4339><s%> but she shall not retain <S%H6113><s%> the power <S%H3581><s%> of the arm; <S%H2220><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he stand, <S%H5975><s%> nor his arm: <S%H2220><s%> but she shall be given <S%H5414><s%> up, and they that brought <S%H935><s%> her, and he that begat <S%H3205><s%> her, and he that strengthened <S%H2388><s%> her in these times. <S%H6256><s%>

But out of a branch <S%H5342><s%> of her roots <S%H8328><s%> shall one stand <S%H5975><s%> up in his estate, <S%H3653><s%> which shall come <S%H935><s%> with an army, <S%H2428><s%> and shall enter <S%H935><s%> into the fortress <S%H4581><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> and shall deal <S%H6213><s%> against them, and shall prevail: <S%H2388><s%>

And shall also <S%H1571><s%> carry <S%H935><s%> captives <S%H7628><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> with their princes, <S%H5257><s%> and with their precious <S%H2532><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and of gold; <S%H2091><s%> and he shall continue <S%H5975><s%> more years <S%H8141><s%> than the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north. <S%H6828><s%>
So the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> into his kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and shall return <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his own land. <S%H127><s%>

But his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall be stirred <S%H1624><s%> up, and shall assemble <S%H622><s%> a multitude <S%H1995><s%> of great <S%H7227><s%> forces: <S%H2428><s%> and one shall certainly come, <S%H935><s%> and overflow, <S%H7857><s%> and pass <S%H5674><s%> through: then shall he return, <S%H7725><s%> and be stirred <S%H1624><s%> up, even to his fortress. <S%H4581><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall be moved with choler, <S%H4843><s%> and shall come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> with him, even with the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north: <S%H6828><s%> and he shall set <S%H5975><s%> forth <S%H5975><s%> a great <S%H7227><s%> multitude; <S%H1995><s%> but the multitude <S%H1995><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And when he has taken <S%H5375><s%> away the multitude, <S%H1995><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> shall be lifted <S%H7311><s%> up; and he shall cast <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> many ten <S%H7239><s%> thousands: <S%H7239><s%> but he shall not be strengthened <S%H5810><s%> by it.

For the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and shall set <S%H5975><s%> forth a multitude <S%H1995><s%> greater <S%H7227><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the former, <S%H7223><s%> and shall certainly come <S%H935><s%> after <S%H7093><s%> certain <S%H6256><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> and with much riches. <S%H7399><s%>

And in those <S%H1992><s%> times <S%H6256><s%> there shall many <S%H7227><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south: <S%H5045><s%> also the robbers <S%H6530><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> shall exalt <S%H5375><s%> themselves to establish <S%H5975><s%> the vision; <S%H2377><s%> but they shall fall. <S%H3782><s%>

So the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> shall come, <S%H935><s%> and cast <S%H8210><s%> up a mount, <S%H5550><s%> and take <S%H3920><s%> the most fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%> and the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall not withstand, <S%H5975><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> his chosen <S%H4005><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> shall there be any strength <S%H3581><s%> to withstand. <S%H5975><s%>

But he that comes <S%H935><s%> against <S%H413><s%> him shall do <S%H6213><s%> according to his own <S%H7522><s%> will, <S%H7522><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him: and he shall stand <S%H5975><s%> in the glorious <S%H6643><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> which by his hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be consumed. <S%H3615><s%>

He shall also set <S%H7760><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> with the strength <S%H8633><s%> of his whole <S%H3605><s%> kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and upright <S%H3477><s%> ones with him; thus shall he do: <S%H6213><s%> and he shall give <S%H5414><s%> him the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of women, <S%H802><s%> corrupting <S%H7843><s%> her: but she shall not stand <S%H5975><s%> on his side, neither <S%H3808><s%> be for him.

After this shall he turn <S%H7725><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> to the isles, <S%H339><s%> and shall take <S%H3920><s%> many: <S%H7227><s%> but a prince <S%H7101><s%> for his own behalf shall cause the reproach <S%H2781><s%> offered by him to cease; <S%H7673><s%> without <S%H1115><s%> his own reproach <S%H2781><s%> he shall cause it to turn <S%H7725><s%> on him.

Then he shall turn <S%H7725><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> toward the fort <S%H4581><s%> of his own land: <S%H776><s%> but he shall stumble <S%H3782><s%> and fall, <S%H5307><s%> and not be found. <S%H4672><s%>

Then shall stand <S%H5975><s%> up in his estate <S%H3653><s%> a raiser <S%H5674><s%> of taxes <S%H5065><s%> in the glory <S%H1925><s%> of the kingdom: <S%H4438><s%> but within few <S%H259><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> he shall be destroyed, <S%H7665><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> in anger, <S%H639><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

And in his estate <S%H3653><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> up a vile <S%H959><s%> person, to whom <S%H5921><s%> they shall not give <S%H5414><s%> the honor <S%H1935><s%> of the kingdom: <S%H4438><s%> but he shall come <S%H935><s%> in peaceably, <S%H7962><s%> and obtain <S%H2388><s%> the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> by flatteries. <S%H2519><s%>

And with the arms <S%H2220><s%> of a flood <S%H7858><s%> shall they be overflowed <S%H7857><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> him, and shall be broken; <S%H7665><s%> yes, <S%H1571><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> the prince <S%H5057><s%> of the covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

And after the league <S%H2266><s%> made with him he shall work <S%H6213><s%> deceitfully: <S%H4820><s%> for he shall come <S%H5927><s%> up, and shall become <S%H6105><s%> strong <S%H6105><s%> with a small <S%H4592><s%> people. <S%H1471><s%>

He shall enter <S%H935><s%> peaceably <S%H7962><s%> even on the fattest <S%H4924><s%> places of the province; <S%H4082><s%> and he shall do <S%H6213><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> his fathers <S%H1><s%> have not done, <S%H6213><s%> nor his fathers' <S%H1><s%> fathers; <S%H1><s%> he shall scatter <S%H967><s%> among them the prey, <S%H961><s%> and spoil, <S%H7998><s%> and riches: <S%H7399><s%> yes, and he shall forecast <S%H2803><s%> his devices <S%H4284><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the strong <S%H4013><s%> holds, <S%H4013><s%> even for a time. <S%H6256><s%>

And he shall stir <S%H5782><s%> up his power <S%H3581><s%> and his courage <S%H3824><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> army; <S%H2428><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall be stirred <S%H1624><s%> up to battle <S%H4421><s%> with a very <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3960><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and mighty <S%H6099><s%> army; <S%H2428><s%> but he shall not stand: <S%H5975><s%> for they shall forecast <S%H2803><s%> devices <S%H4284><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him.

Yes, they that feed <S%H398><s%> of the portion <S%H6598><s%> of his meat <S%H6598><s%> shall destroy <S%H7665><s%> him, and his army <S%H2428><s%> shall overflow: <S%H7857><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> down slain. <S%H2491><s%>

And both <S%H8147><s%> of these kings' <S%H4428><s%> hearts <S%H3824><s%> shall be to do mischief, <S%H4827><s%> and they shall speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H3576><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> one <S%H259><s%> table; <S%H7979><s%> but it shall not prosper: <S%H6743><s%> for yet <S%H5750><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> shall be at the time appointed. <S%H4150><s%>

Then shall he return <S%H7725><s%> into his land <S%H776><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> riches; <S%H7399><s%> and his heart <S%H3824><s%> shall be against <S%H5921><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> covenant; <S%H1285><s%> and he shall do <S%H6213><s%> exploits, and return <S%H7725><s%> to his own land. <S%H776><s%>

At the time appointed <S%H4150><s%> he shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> toward the south; <S%H5045><s%> but it shall not be as the former, <S%H7223><s%> or as the latter. <S%H314><s%>

For the ships <S%H6716><s%> of Chittim <S%H3794><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> against him: therefore he shall be grieved, <S%H3512><s%> and return, <S%H7725><s%> and have indignation <S%H2194><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> covenant: <S%H1285><s%> so shall he do; <S%H6213><s%> he shall even return, <S%H7725><s%> and have intelligence <S%H995><s%> with them that forsake <S%H5800><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

And arms <S%H2220><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> on his part, and they shall pollute <S%H2490><s%> the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of strength, <S%H4581><s%> and shall take <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> the daily <S%H8548><s%> sacrifice, and they shall place <S%H5414><s%> the abomination <S%H8251><s%> that makes desolate. <S%H8074><s%>

And such as do wickedly <S%H7561><s%> against the covenant <S%H1285><s%> shall he corrupt <S%H2610><s%> by flatteries: <S%H2514><s%> but the people <S%H5971><s%> that do know <S%H3045><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> shall be strong, <S%H2388><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> exploits.

And they that understand <S%H7919><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> shall instruct <S%H995><s%> many: <S%H7227><s%> yet they shall fall <S%H3782><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and by flame, <S%H3852><s%> by captivity, <S%H7628><s%> and by spoil, <S%H961><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Now when they shall fall, <S%H3782><s%> they shall be helped <S%H5826><s%> with a little <S%H4592><s%> help: <S%H5828><s%> but many <S%H7227><s%> shall join <S%H3867><s%> to them with flatteries. <S%H2519><s%>

And some of them of understanding <S%H7919><s%> shall fall, <S%H3782><s%> to try <S%H6884><s%> them, and to purge, <S%H1305><s%> and to make them white, <S%H3835><s%> even to the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end: <S%H7093><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5750><s%> it is yet <S%H5750><s%> for a time appointed. <S%H4150><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> according to his will; <S%H7522><s%> and he shall exalt <S%H7311><s%> himself, and magnify <S%H1431><s%> himself above <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> god, <S%H410><s%> and shall speak <S%H1696><s%> marvelous <S%H6381><s%> things against <S%H5921><s%> the God <S%H410><s%> of gods, <S%H410><s%> and shall prosper <S%H6743><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> the indignation <S%H2195><s%> be accomplished: <S%H3615><s%> for that that is determined <S%H2782><s%> shall be done. <S%H6213><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he regard <S%H995><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of his fathers, <S%H1><s%> nor the desire <S%H2532><s%> of women, <S%H802><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> regard <S%H995><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> god: <S%H433><s%> for he shall magnify <S%H1431><s%> himself above <S%H5921><s%> all. <S%H3605><s%>

But in his estate <S%H3653><s%> shall he honor <S%H3513><s%> the God <S%H433><s%> of forces: <S%H4581><s%> and a god <S%H433><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> his fathers <S%H1><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not shall he honor <S%H3513><s%> with gold, <S%H2091><s%> and silver, <S%H3701><s%> and with precious <S%H3368><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and pleasant <S%H2530><s%> things.

Thus shall he do <S%H6213><s%> in the most <S%H4581><s%> strong <S%H4581><s%> holds <S%H4013><s%> with a strange <S%H5236><s%> god, <S%H433><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he shall acknowledge <S%H5234><s%> and increase <S%H7235><s%> with glory: <S%H3519><s%> and he shall cause them to rule <S%H4910><s%> over many, <S%H7227><s%> and shall divide <S%H2505><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> for gain. <S%H4242><s%>

And at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%> shall the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> push <S%H5055><s%> at him: and the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> shall come <S%H8175><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him like a whirlwind, <S%H8175><s%> with chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and with horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> and with many <S%H7227><s%> ships; <S%H591><s%> and he shall enter <S%H935><s%> into the countries, <S%H776><s%> and shall overflow <S%H7857><s%> and pass <S%H5674><s%> over. <S%H5674><s%>

He shall enter <S%H935><s%> also into the glorious <S%H6643><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> countries shall be overthrown: <S%H3782><s%> but these <S%H428><s%> shall escape <S%H4422><s%> out of his hand, <S%H3027><s%> even Edom, <S%H123><s%> and Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and the chief <S%H7225><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>
He shall stretch <S%H7971><s%> forth his hand <S%H3027><s%> also on the countries: <S%H776><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall not escape. <S%H6413><s%>

But he shall have power <S%H4910><s%> over the treasures <S%H4362><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and over all <S%H3605><s%> the precious <S%H2530><s%> things of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and the Libyans <S%H3864><s%> and the Ethiopians <S%H3569><s%> shall be at his steps. <S%H4703><s%>

But tidings <S%H8052><s%> out of the east <S%H4217><s%> and out of the north <S%H6828><s%> shall trouble <S%H926><s%> him: therefore he shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> fury <S%H2534><s%> to destroy, <S%H8045><s%> and utterly to make away <S%H2763><s%> many. <S%H7227><s%>

And he shall plant <S%H5193><s%> the tabernacles <S%H168><s%> of his palace <S%H643><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the seas <S%H3220><s%> in the glorious <S%H6643><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain; <S%H2022><s%> yet he shall come <S%H935><s%> to his end, <S%H7093><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> shall help <S%H5826><s%> him.
